alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Castro; Lamb; Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:01PM CDT until July 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR BAILEY...PARMER...WESTERN CASTRO AND WESTERN LAMB COUNTIES... At 501 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Black to 4 miles east of Progress to 5 miles north of Maple, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet. At 455 PM CDT, the Friona mesonet gusted to 67 mph. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Littlefield, Muleshoe, Dimmitt, Friona, Earth, Bovina, Farwell, Sudan, Amherst, Summerfield, Needmore, Easter, Lazbuddie, Progress, Oklahoma Lane, Lariat, Enochs, West Camp, Black and Rhea. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
